creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
description: two young women wearing traditional Japanese costumes; seated girl wearing a multicolored flowered kimono with a mirror on a box with drawers in front of her having her hair styled by a standing girl in a pale blue kimono; vase of flowers behind standing girl

title: Girls Dressing Hair, from a photography album with images of Japan
